strengths: Starts with a war sun — immediate board presence
Valuable promissory note (Fires of the Gashlai gives war sun tech)
War sun is a powerful negotiation tool
weaknesses: War sun is vulnerable to counter-attacks, Direct Hit, and targeted abilities
Mobile opponents can avoid the war sun entirely
Influence scarcity limits command token economy
tips: Use your war sun as a negotiation tool, not aggression — threaten, don't attack
Sell war sun technology (promissory note) across the table for VP advancement
Secure a second war sun by round 2
Accept command token limitations; use Star Forge only for war sun protection
Take Warfare strategy card to protect war sun from counter-attacks
Secure a slightly larger territory slice early, then defend with war suns and PDS

techPaths.name: Red + Yellow (with red skip)
techPaths.note: Alternative; War Sun II not always worth it without skip
